rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural light from a glass door leading to the garden.
Spacious living area with large windows for ventilation and view of garden.
Cozy dining space adjoining the kitchen with ample natural light.
Modern kitchen with an open design and ventilation windows.
Utility space for storage and appliances.
Luxurious master bedroom with a private balcony oriented according to Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom designed for privacy and natural light.
Another bedroom with window placements that ensure proper ventilation as per Vastu norms.
Bohemian style bedroom integrating natural textures and open space for creative expression.

openings.description: Large front door designed for welcoming light and air circulation.
Side windows placed to maximize natural light as per Vastu guidelines.
Window overlooking the garden for enhanced ventilation and scenic view.

rooms.description: A quiet study area with ample natural light from the east.
Spacious bedroom designed for relaxation and fresh air flow.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy with adequate ventilation.
Bohemian styled bedroom incorporating artistic elements and natural light.
Modern bathroom with windows for ventilation in line with local norms.

openings.description: Balconies on each bedroom to enhance natural light and provide scenic garden views.
Strategically placed windows ensuring continuous cross ventilation in accordance with Vastu.

garden.description: Large garden space integrated with the overall design for natural aesthetics and relaxation.

additional_info.vastu_considerations: Design elements such as room placements, door orientations, window positions, and balcony locations have been strategically aligned to adhere to Vastu principles and ensure optimal energy flow, natural light, and ventilation.
additional_info.architectural_style: Bohemian luxury design with open layouts, creative textures, and vibrant color accents reflecting Bohemian ethos while ensuring modern luxury standards.
